thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 30 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: China says does not want trade war but is not scared of one

author: Reuters Editorial
title: China says does not want trade war but is not scared of one
text:
BEIJING, May 30 (Reuters) - China’s Foreign Ministry on Wednesday urged the United States to meet China halfway and said that it does not want trade war but is not scared of one.
Ministry spokeswoman Hua Chunying made the comment at a regular press briefing. (Reporting by Ben Blanchard; Writing by Michael Martina; Editing by Kim Coghill)
